title: Khaiphaen
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Laotian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with a gift shop. Makes Lao cuisine. Funded by an organization that trains disadvantaged youth. Plenty of Vegetarian and vegan options. Try the local khaiphaen and tofu dish. NOTE: Please send correct/exact map coordinates to happycow!
streetAddress: 100 Sisavang Vatana Rd, Ban Wat Nong
